project_descr: The project objective is to create a functioning, sustainable and effective ESCO market in Moldova, as the basis for scaling up mitigation efforts in the whole municipal building sector in Moldova.

outputs.output_descr: The project objective is to create a functioning, sustainable and effective ESCO market in Moldova, as the basis for scaling up mitigation efforts in the whole municipal building sector in Moldova.

project_title: transforming the market for urban energy efficiency
